ygData.subject: Re: Blue Plate Mail
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, Once again us dwarven warriors get to bend over and take it. We don t get slam, and now we don t get this new armor either. But, hey, we do have a really
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, Once again us dwarven warriors get to bend over and take it. We don't get
slam, and now we don't get this new armor either. But, hey, we do have a really
cool jump animation! We do that awesome tuck-and-roll when we jump! WOW! That's
worth something isn't it? Isn't it? *Laughs bitterly*


James Wofford wrote:

> From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
>
> Barbarian warriors can wear the armor as well because they can wear medium
> sized armor. So dont let the size throw you off doing the quests. Trolls
> and Ogres are out of luck as well as the dwarves. Sorry guys.
>
> Dyvim Kincaid
> Warrior of Cazic Thule
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Dean Boyle [mailto:gino_14@...]
> > Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 3:13 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Blue Plate Mail
> >
> >
> > From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>
> >
> > Yes I do, I have (well almost) a full set uf it couse my dad is
> > vl 49 druid
> > and he get's them for me. ANyways it is magical, medium size
> > only warriors.
> > and some of the armor will be hard for a lvl 50 to attaine couse the
> > quest is so hard. so if your not a human, high elf warrior.. then your
> > stuck without crafted armor. yeay! I'm a human!
> >
> >
> > ----Original Message Follows----
> > From: "Jynxx" <jynxx@...>
> > Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> > Subject: [warriors_eq] Blue Plate Mail
> > Date: Wed, 21 Jul 1999 20:58:18 -0500
> >
> > From: "Jynxx" <jynxx@...>
> >
> > Jiya guys. Just some questions. I heard that there are two centaurs in the
> > Centaur Village in South Karana at 200, -2400 that offer Blue Plate or
> > "Crafted", and that it is Warrior Only armor. Does anyone know what items
> > you need to give and what the stats are? Also any magic on it? Any info
> > appreciated!
> >
> > Jynxx
